paragraphs.text:
%sh

# if [[-d /tmp/ml-latest]]; then
#     rm -fr /tmp/ml-latest
#     echo "Removed existing folder"
# fi

wget -q -O /tmp/ml-latest.zip http://files.grouplens.org/datasets/movielens/ml-latest.zip
echo "Dowloaded ml-latest.zip ..."

unzip /tmp/ml-latest.zip -d /tmp/
rm /tmp/ml-latest.zip
echo "Unpacked ml-latest.zip ..."

dir0=/tmp/datalake
dir1=links
dir2=movies
dir3=ratings
dir4=tags
dir5=/user/zeppelin/sparkRDD/input

for dir in $dir1 $dir2 $dir3 $dir4;do
# if [[-d $dir0/$dir]]; then
#     rm -r $dir0/$dir1
# fi
    mkdir -p $dir0/$dir
    
    mv /tmp/ml-latest/$dir.csv $dir0/$dir/
    echo "Moved $dir.csv to $dir0/$dir/ ..."
done

rm -r /tmp/ml-latest
echo "Datalake files created!"

hdfs dfs -mkdir -p $dir5
echo "Directory $dir5 created in hdfs"
hdfs dfs -put -f $dir0/$dir3/$dir3.csv $dir0/$dir2/$dir2.csv $dir5
echo "Copy $dir3.csv to hdfs://$dir5 complete"
echo "Copy $dir2.csv to hdfs://$dir5 complete"

rdd_normalized_ratings = rdd_ratings.map(normalize_ratings).filter(lambda line: line[0] != None and line[1] != None)

%spark.ipyspark

rdd_transformed_movies = rdd_normalized_movies.flatMap(lambda line: [(line[0], line[1], line[2], genre) for genre in line[3]]).map(lambda line: (line[0],(line[1],line[2],line[3])))
seqOp = lambda x, y: (x[0] + y, x[1] + 1)
combOp = lambda x, y: (x[0] + y[0], x[1] + y[1])
rdd_transformed_ratings = rdd_normalized_ratings.aggregateByKey((0, 0),seqOp, combOp).mapValues(lambda x: round(x[0]/x[1], 2))
